title: Large, sunny 1 bedroom apartment in West Philly
description:
Available May 31, 2022 with open house on Tuesday May 31 from 6:00-7:30pm: large, sunny 1 bedroom apartment in West Philly on 50th Street.
The apartment is the entire second floor of an approximately 100-year-old house. The street entrance and hallway up to the 3rd floor entrance is shared with only the third floor resident.
The apartment features:
- Large living room with tall ceilings, original refinishing hardwood floors and custom trim, large  panel of west-facing windows, 2-zone dimmable lighting, variable speed fan with remote, and AC unit
- Medium bedroom with tall ceilings, original refinished hardwood floors and custom trim, tall closet for storage, north and east-facing windows (one is original to house and is working, one ir recent replacement), dimmable lights, variable-speed fan with light and remote, AC unit, and walk-out to roof
- Custom kitchen, with granite countertops, stainless appliances, gas stove with an exhaust fan venting outside, a Bosch dishwasher, built-in microwave, sink disposal, tile backsplash, variable-speed fan with light and remote, custom-built trim for cabinets, working original wood windows, AC unit, and a small breakfast nook area with south and north facing windows
- Renovated bathroom with tile shower with custom niche, sliding glass door, tiled floor and walls, Toto toilet, solid surface sink with four drawers for storage, medicine cabinet with mirror and integrated side panel lighting, dimmable ceiling lighting, including lighting in shower, towel shelf, built-in wall storage shelves, exhaust fan and privacy window
- In-unit washer/dryer
- Radiant heat throughout (not forced air)
- Solid wood doors with vintage brass hardware
- Wireless doorbell
- French door separating living room from rear of apartment (great for work from home or shared living situations)
- Coat closet and hallway closet for storage
- Dedicated hot water heater and boiler with individual utility account (resident only pays for their specific use for electric and natural gas)
- Heavy wood door at entrance, and brightly-lit hallway with skylight
The neighborhood features:
- Baltimore Avenue commercial corridor about 10 blocks south, with lots of pedestrian amenities including Clark Park and Cedar Park, Dock Street Brewery and Mariposa Co-op
- Aldi nearby at 46/Market
- Ten-minute connections to Center City (six stops), or 15 minute to Old City via SEPTA stations at 46th or 52nd Street stations nearby, or via Route 21 (Chestnut east, Walnut going west) or Route 42 (Spruce St)
- CHOP Karabots and KIPP school
- CVS at 49th/Market
- Malcolm X Park at 52nd and Osage
- mixed of PPA permitted and non-permitted street parking for cars
Floor plan: the apartment opens to a hall with the living room to the left, bathroom straight ahead and kitchen to the right. The living room has a french door that can be closed for privacy - great for work-from-home situations or shared living situations. The hall includes the coat closet and the washer/dryer. The bedroom is accessed via the kitchen and has a door to the roof deck.
The apartment has only hardwood floors or tiled floors. There is no carpet anywhere.
The apartment floor is insulated from the third floor above, so the noise level is lower than you might expect for an old house.
The house allows some pets, at the owner’s discretion.
The current resident on the third floor is a young professional and has been there for nearly five years.
The first floor resident is an elderly resident who has lived there for over 10 years.
Apartment is managed by the owner who is responsive to maintenance issues and lives nearby.
The apartment is available Tuesday May 31, 2021, with an open house happening the same day - Tuesday May 31 - from 6:00-7:30pm. Virtual viewings and more photos will be available soon.
The lease is offered on a yearly basis. Preference may be given to applicants who are interested to sign a 2 year lease.
This is 2022, and this is an equal housing opportunity, regardless of color, orientation or national origin. You will be more than welcome as a resident if you can appreciate living in a 100 year home, demonstrate respect for the other residents and the property itself, and be thoughtful and considerate regarding noise (residents on the other floors have lived there for at least five years).
If interested, please reply to this post and include some information about yourself and what brings you to West Philly. To confirm you read to the bottom of the ad, please mention your favorite color in the subject or body of your email (or a cool fact about you, something interesting you learned recently, or anything that shows you read to the end).

title: 4 bedroom/3.5 bath home, complete with 4-car parking!!
description:
N Beechwood St, Look no further; this exceptional, architect-designed Art Museum home has space, space and more space! With seemingly endless improvements, this 2-story, 4 bedroom/3.5 bath home, complete with 4-car parking (2-car garage & 2 driveway spaces) will tick all your boxes. Nestled on a quiet tree-lined street in the Fairmount area of Philadelphia, this home offers a rare chance to own 2400+ square feet in the city (plus roughly 1000 sq ft below grade!). The owners combined the two side-by-side homes in a thoughtful and practical way, allowing for interesting and smart spaces. The expansive enclosed porch welcomes you as the perfect place to sit year-round to watch the world go by.  Enter into the airy foyer featuring original oak floors with walnut inlay. The living room flows off of the foyer in one direction, and the dining room in another, giving the main living level an open and casual vibe. Step from the living room into a cozy sitting area, which then leads you into your bonus room. Currently used as an office, this fabulously placed room could serve as an office, playroom, art/homework room, or home gym! Towards the rear of the house,  the butler's pantry - complete with wet bar and wine fridge - leads you to the dining room and kitchen, making holidays and entertaining effortless. The bright and cheerful kitchen (renovated in 2017) features chic quartz counter tops, large subway tile backsplash, glass front cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, including a hand-made Blue Star chef’s range and access to a peaceful, private deck. The main level, completed by a powder room, also offers central AC and refinished floors. The upper level has a special layout and can be as conventional or unique as you want! Welcoming you at the top of the stairs is the lovely sitting area which could be kept as is, turned into a home library, reading/tv lounge, art nook, etc. There are 4 spacious bedrooms, and the current owners have used two of them - plus one of the two hall baths - as the primary suite. There is a second full bath on the upper level, as well. The lower level finished basement just keeps going and features a large laundry room with a full bathroom, another bonus room, ample storage, a massive walk-in pantry, and interior access to 2 separate garages and 2 additional parking spots. This special home also boasts a 2017 roof, updated plumbing and electrical, new porch windows, fresh paint, and more! This home was truly loved and cherished and is waiting for you. Schedule your private showing today!
For more information and pictures call 🏠 ☎️  show contact info

title: Amazing 3-bedroom, 2 full bath HOUSE FOR RENT@!
description:
W Mount Airy Ave, Welcome to 436 W Mt Airy Ave, an exceptional Northwest twin on a quiet tree-lined street in beautiful West Mt.Airy. This turnkey home was has been rewired (no knob and tube!)  and boasts air conditioning, (mini-splits), a garage, and lovely patio surrounded by greenery.  As one enters the house, there is a light-filled converted sunroom that features the lovely crown molding and trim found throughout the house. Hardwood floors flow from the sunroom through the living room and into the dining room, giving the first floor a cohesive, open feeling, perfect for entertaining. The living room, itself, features an ornamental fireplace that can accommodate a gas insert if desired. The full dining room includes a beautiful alcove, perfect for your hutch or sideboard, a large storage closet and a built-in corner cabinet for table-setting essentials. Beyond, the eat-in kitchen has been updated with granite countertops, a dishwasher and garbage disposal, solid wood soft-close cabinets, a stainless steel refrigerator, and is made particularly special with a backsplash of Mercer tiles from the legendary Moravian tileworks. There is an exterior door that leads from the kitchen to the side yard and the steps to the garage at the rear of the house, making unloading groceries a breeze. Additional living space, including a half-bathroom can be found in the partially finished basement, which also includes a washer/dryer,  room for extra storage or additional living space, and walk out access to the alley.  On the second floor, you will find 3 generously-sized bedrooms, all with original hardwood floors, updated windows, ceiling fans, and each with its own mini-split unit for air conditioning—but also for heating on those chilly Fall nights when you don’t want to turn on the furnace. The larger front bedroom features an abundance of closet space, a built-in makeup table and tree top views of lovely West Mount Airy Avenue.  The hall bath, with white tile, has a shower and tub combo, a vanity with storage, and a full-sized linen closet.  Beyond what the eye can easily see, 436 W Mt Airy offers peace of mind for the savvy buyer with its new sewer line, replacement windows, updated wiring (no knob and tube!) and the mini-split AC system.  What’s more, the home was certified lead safe in 2021. title: 3 Bedroom/2 bath Queen Village Townhouse
description:
Awesome 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom entire corner rowhouse available July 1st - finish our lease as a sublet through September 15th with option to renew an annual lease at that time. We have lived here since September of '21 and are buying a house in the same neighborhood.
$2700/month plus utilities
About the home:
This is a fantastic, remodeled townhouse (the architect who did it used to own this house) with a back patio and a working wood-burning fireplace in the Meredith school catchment! The entrance opens onto a quaint and quiet side street in a fantastic neighborhood! 3 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms and a giant walk-in closet (really it is an entire room full of closets). Large basement for storage. Dogs/cats OK! Central air, gas range and loads of natural light.
Please contact me if you are interested!
Longer description of home:
Light soaked, Queen Village corner property in the Meredith School Catchment. This contemporary 3 bed, 2 bath home was designed, built & lived in by architect/designer Jerry Jarosinski. The open floor plan with hardwood floors and wood burning fireplace sets the tone for a very warm and inviting home. On the second floor you will find 2 bedrooms with custom built-ins and a well appointed bathroom. The Master Suite is found on the top floor and includes a separate dressing area with extra closets. The Master bathroom features a deep soaking tub, light fixtures and a vanity. With a Walk Score of 100, the walkability of this neighborhood makes living here very easy since you are surrounded by cafes, restaurants and multiple city parks. The clean basement includes a washer/dryer and an ample amount of storage space. Also enjoy a built in, wired speaker system throughout the house.
*pets OK with owner permission
*Security system on premises, has option to be activated and payments are solely responsibility of tenant
